import request from"./request";// 轮播图
export function getTopBanners(){return request({url:"/banner"});}// 热门推荐
export function getHotRecommends(limit){return request({// url: "/personalized?limit=8",
url:"/personalized",params:{limit:limit}});}//新碟上架
export function getNewAlbum(limit,offset){return request({url:"/top/album",params:{limit:limit,offset:offset}});}// 榜单
export function getTopList(idx){return request({url:"/top/list",params:{idx:idx}});}// 入住歌手
export function getArtistList(limit,cat){return request({url:"/artist/list",params:{cat:cat,limit:limit}});}// 热门主播
